NOT_FOUND.TEXT: Sorry, we can't find the page you're looking for
NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page not found

V3.CHANGE_PASSWORD_OLD_PW_BAD: Your old password was incorrect and could not be changed.
V3.COMMENTS_BOX_CHECKBOX: Send me an email when there is a follow up
V3.COMMENTS_NOTIFY_NO: No thanks, I don't want an email
V3.COMMENTS_NOTIFY_YES: Yes, send an email when I receive a comment
V3.COMMENTS_OFF: Do not show comments at all
V3.COMMENTS_ON: Show comments on all pages in my website
V3.COMMENTS_ON_EXCEPT: Show comments on all pages except selected.
V3.COMMENTS_WITH_APPROVAL: I want to approve comments before they appear on my site
V3.CONTACTME_HEADLINE: Write your message here. Fill out the form:
V3.INTEGRATE_DISCLAIMER: Any customer looking to earn some sort of online virtual currency for completing this offer CANNOT select this free product option. One of the two paid versions below must be selected in order to earn your virtual currency credit.
V3.MANAGE_COMMENTS_BLOCKED_SUB: Here is the list of users you blocked from making comments. When you block a visitor, they can no longer add comments to your website.
V3.MANAGE_COMMENTS_BLOCKED_VISITOR_BODY: You can easily unblock users and give them permission to write comments on your website.
V3.MANAGE_COMMENTS_BODY: If you experience inappropriate comments, you can easily block that user from writing more comments. Remember: You can always remove the blocking so the user can write comments on your website.
V3.MANAGE_COMMENTS_NO_BLOCKED_BODY: Anyone can write comments on your website.
V3.MANAGE_COMMENTS_TIP: Click below if you want to make changes to your comments.
V3.PAGE_NAME_EMPTY: You must enter a name of the page
V3.STATS_GET_WEEKLY_UPDATES: Get weekly email updates with your website statistics
V3.STATS_PAGES_SUBTITLE: An overview of the number of page views, likes and comments per page on your website. Use these statistics to see which of your pages are performing best.
V3.STATS_PAGES_TITLE: Most popular pages on your website
V3.STATS_SHOW_COUNTER: Show a visit counter on the bottom of your website
V3.STATS_SUBTITLE: See what’s happened on your website here
V3.STATS_VISITS_TITLE: Total unique visits to your website:
V3.VIDEOSHOW_PLEASEWAIT_LESSTHANXMINUTES: You can view your video clip in a few moments
V3.YOUR_SUBSCRIPTION_SUBTITLE: Upgrade now and get your own personal domain name

WELCOME_MOBILE.TEXT: You’re about to create a website on your mobile. Please keep in mind that your website will look different on mobile than it does on desktop.

WELCOME_MOBILE_VIDEO.TEXT: You’re about to create a website on your smartphone. This video will quickly guide you through all the basics of making a website with your smartphone, so you are good to go.
